alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 1:15AM PST until February 25 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches, locally higher, between 1000 to 1500 feet, 1 to 3 feet between 1500 and 3000 feet, and 3 to 6 feet above 3000 feet. Winds gusts as high as 50 to 75 mph, locally higher near the crest. * WHERE...Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley, Motherlode, Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass, Highway 50 over Echo Summit, and Highway 88 over Carson Pass. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Downed trees and tree limbs and local power outages are possible due to heavy snow and gusty winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1000 to 2000 feet, locally lower. Heaviest snow expected tonight into Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
